alert.note: Alert for Gove (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 11:48PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Logan and Gove Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1147 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Oakley to 4 miles north of Scott City. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Grinnell around 1205 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Grainfield, Park and Quinter. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 76 and 112. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
